title: Investigation of the potential of pomegranate peel as a treatment option for heavy metal contaminated wastewater: Experimental and modeling approaches
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Javad Zareei, Nizomiddin Juraev, Sabir Tagelsir Hassan Widatalla, M. Kerwad, Dmitry Olegovich Bokov, Khalid A. Alkhuzai, Carlos Rodriguez-Benites, Merwa Alhadrawi, Salah Hassan Zain Al-Abdeen
